ProjectTitle: Citizens' perceptions on the ethics of health technology innovations: Recommendations for ethically responsible design, development and use
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/06/2024
Preservation: please note that onedrive is not intended for long term preservation of data, this is linked to a personal account and expires when the researcher leaves KU Leuven; you can use a data repository (eg RDR https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) instead, or have a look at the storage guide for other solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: note that RDR will assign a DOI to your data upon deposit
